M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.mygdx.game.desktop.DesktopLauncher
 
MainGame - Class in com.mygdx.game
The MainGame, which extends the Game class, is currently responsible for starting the execution of the application by calling upon the MainMenu class.
MainGame() - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.MainGame
 
mainMenu() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.MainGame
Sets the current screen to the MainMenu screen.
MainMenu - Class in com.mygdx.game
The MainMenu class displays the main menu screen for the user that controls general program flow.
MainMenu(Game) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.MainMenu
The constructor for the MainMenu class takes in a Game from the MainGame, and runs the create() method.
managers - package managers
 
map - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.Movement
 
Movement - Class in com.mygdx.game
 
Movement(Game) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.Movement
The class' constructor takes in the game screen from MainMenu, and runs the create() method.
